data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body: We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors at its meeting held on April 17, 2023 through video conferencing which has approved Audited Financial Results of the Company for the financial year ended March 31, 2023, both Standalone and consolidated and dividend.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Pursuant to regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations, we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today, i.e. January 24, 2023 which commenced at 5:00 p.m. IST and concluded at 07:30 p.m. IST, inter alia  to approve Unaudited Consolidated and Standalone Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2022.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body: Pursuant to regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations, we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today, i.e. October 19, 2022 which commenced at 5:00 p.m. IST and concluded at 07:25 p.m. IST, inter alia to consider and approve Unaudited Consolidated and Standalone Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2022.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body: We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today, i.e. July 21, 2022 which commenced at 5:00 p.m. and concluded at 08:00 p.m., inter alia transacted and approved Unaudited Consolidated and Standalone Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended June 30, 2022 and Buyback of shares of the Company

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body: In continuation to our letter dated May 02, 2022 intimating about earnings call for Q4FY22 results, we wish to inform you that the call recording of investor/analyst call held on Friday, May 06, 2022, at 04:00 PM IST is available on Company's website. The link to access the said audio recording is as follows: https://www.quickheal.co.in/documents/investors/conference-call-Q4FY22.mp3

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body: We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors at its meeting held on May 05, 2022 through video conferencing has approved the Audited Financial Results of the Company for the financial year ended March 31, 2022, both Standalone and consolidated.

data.caption: Results- Financial Statements For The Quarter Ended December 31, 2021
data.news_body: We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors at its meeting held on January 24, 2022 through video conferencing has approved the Unaudited Consolidated and Standalone Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2021.

data.caption: Results - Financial Statements For The Quarter Ended September 30, 2021
data.news_body: We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors at its meeting held on October 25, 2021 through video conferencing which approved the Unaudited Consolidated and Standalone Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2021.

data.caption: Financial Results Of The Quarter Ended June 30, 2021
data.news_body: We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors at its meeting held on August 07, 2021 through video conferencing which commenced at 02:30 PM and concluded at 5:45 PM, has approved the Unaudited Consolidated and Standalone Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended June 30, 2021 and De-registration and closure of wholly owned subsidiary of the Company Quick Heal Technologies Japan KK.

data.caption: Related Party Transaction For The Half Year Ended March 31, 2021
data.news_body: Pursuant to regulation 23(9) of SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirements) Regulation, 2015 and other applicable regulations, if any, the disclosures of related party transactions on a consolidated basis for the half year ended March 31, 2021 are enclosed for your record.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body: We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors at its meeting held on May 15, 2021 through video conferencing  has approved the Audited Financial Results of the Company for the financial year ended March 31, 2021, both Standalone and consolidated
